node.html: An intelligent recruitment platfrom. AiCruit tracks the list of applications for the job. The app shows personality profile graphs and calculates honesty scores, creates a word cloud from recommendation letters.

frontmatter.title: Personality Interest Mapper using Twitter API

node.html: Creates entertainment domain like movies, books and music recommendations based on person's tweet data

The app features functionality to search courses, register for courses, create a blog post to share experiences and educate others, and showcases self-help details published by the stop the bleed program.
